Summary: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has conveyed his best wishes to all the pilgrims on the commencement of the holy Amarnath Yatra. He posted on X
Gist: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has extended his best wishes to pilgrims on the start of the Amarnath Yatra and is set to release three books on Shri M. Venkaiah Naidu’s life and journey on 30th June at 12 noon via video conferencing, including a biography, a photo chronicle, and a Telugu pictorial biography, authored by distinguished writers.

Headings: PM to release three books on the life and journey of former Vice President Shri M. Venkaiah Naidu on 30th June
text_data: On the eve of 75th birthday of former Vice President of India, Shri M. Venkaiah Naidu, Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi will release three books on his life and journey on 30th June at 12 noon via video conferencing. The event is scheduled to take place at Anvaya Convention Centre in Gachibowli, Hyderabad. The books to be released by Prime Minister include :(i)Â  Biography of the former Vice President titled â€œVenkaiah Naidu â€“ Life in Serviceâ€ authored by Shri S Nagesh Kumar, former Resident Editor of The Hindu, Hyderabad edition(ii) â€œCelebrating Bharat â€“ The Mission and Message of Shri M Venkaiah Naidu as 13th Viceâ€“President of Indiaâ€, a Photo chronicle compiled by Dr. I.V. Subba Rao, Former Secretary to Vice-President of India(iii) Pictorial biography in Telugu titled â€œMahaneta â€“ Life and Journey of Shri M. Venkaiah Naiduâ€ authored by Shri Sanjay Kishore.Â DS/STOn the eve of 75th birthday of former Vice President of India, Shri M. Venkaiah Naidu, Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi will release three books on his life and journey on 30th June at 12 noon via video conferencing. Subba Rao, Former Secretary to Vice-President of India(iii) Pictorial biography in Telugu titled â€œMahaneta â€“ Life and Journey of Shri M. Venkaiah Naiduâ€ authored by Shri Sanjay Kishore.Â DS/ST
Summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will release three books on Shri M. Venkaiah Naidu’s life and journey.The event is scheduled for 30th June at 12 noon via video conferencing.The books include a biography, a photo chronicle, and a pictorial biography in Telugu, authored by notable individuals.
